name: Drow Bandit

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
text: <$title_short_name$> has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put Drow Bandit to sleep.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
text: While in sunlight, Drow Bandit has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
text: <$title_short_name$>'s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 10). <$title_short_name$> can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

action.name: Scimitar
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.

action.name: Light Crossbow
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

description: Source: Out of the Abyss p. 194
